settings.title: HD Cameras & Sensors
settings.text: With clear, HD video – day or night – it’s easy to check in on the kids.

settings.title: About Mobi
settings.text: Look for MOBI products – including our digital thermometers, Bluetooth speakers and night lights – at major retailers in the United States and beyond. We value our retail partners as well as our customers, and we understand that you’re key to our success.

settings.quote: This camera works great as a baby monitor and pet monitor. I bought it for my toddlers room to watch her during Nap/quiet time and I love that I can see the entire room, hear her and talk to her.

settings.title: Two Way Audio using the Mobile device
settings.custom_html: Soothe your baby or loved ones to sleep with the help of Two-way audio by singing or reading their favorite stories with your mobile device from anywhere.

settings.title: Clear Night Vision
settings.text: Advanced Night Vision uses IR-Cut Infrared LED’s for ultra clear video with a 40 ft. range in complete darkness.

settings.title:
Local Storage For
Continuous Recording
settings.text: MobiCam supports up to a 128GB microSD card for continuous local storage. Use the MobiCam App to manage recordings and playbacks.
